author: VICE News, Michael Learmonth
title: Trump Is Halting Funding to the World Health Organization During the Coronavirus Pandemic
description: He blamed the WHO for its slow response to the coronavirus pandemic and for pushing China's "misinformation about the virus."
content:
President Trump announced he will halt funding of the World Health Organization while the United States reviews its role in severely mismanaging and covering up the spread of coronavirus.
Trump said the U.S. contributes $400 to $500 million a year to the U.N… [+1788 chars]
